content: All good. My Dad told me once that a professional always signs and dates their work. And one doesn’t forward a copy of something without having the source and date on it. In the days before the internet and some even still now, will send me a ‘clipping’ of a piece from a newspaper, cut out in the shape of the article, with no author’s name, date or reference to where they found it and go “I thought you’d like this!” Yeah, but what good is it if it can’t be referenced?
